actionCalls.name: myRule_10_A1
actionCalls.label: notify of new APAC Acc from non-APAC user

value.stringValue: {"mentions":[],"message":"Check this new opportunity, that has just been created: https://u-blox.my.salesforce.com/{![Account].New_Opportunity__c}"}
Check this new opportunity, that has just been created: https://u-blox.my.salesforce.com/{!myVariable_current.New_Opportunity__c}

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.label: Lead conversion: set Account fields for shop purchase

rules.name: myRule_10
rules.label: Notify of new APAC Account from no-APAC user

Flow.description: This Process moved to Flow = Account: Email Alerts, Account: Before Create/Update and Account: After Created/Updated

formulas.name: formula_8_myRule_7_A1_4831386494

value.stringValue: IF(([Account].Region__c = "APAC"), IF(([Account].LastModifiedById <> [Account].Owner.Id), IF(([Account].LastModifiedById <> [Account].CreatedById), IF(CONTAINS([Account].LastModifiedBy.Profile.Name, "Distributor"), (ISCHANGED([Account].Name) || ISCHANGED([Account].Priority__c) || ISCHANGED([Account].Distributor__c)), false), false), false), false)
OR( ISCHANGED([Account].BillingCity), ISCHANGED([Account].BillingStreet), ISCHANGED([Account].BillingState), ISCHANGED([Account].BillingCountry), ISCHANGED([Account].BillingPostalCode) )

Flow.label: Acc: Record Update Notify Processes

recordUpdates.name: myRule_7_A1
recordUpdates.label: set Lead Information to Lead values
